channel.title: Sex Drive with Dr. Ava | Blog Talk Radio Feed
channel.description: For no holds barred talk about sex, love and relationships - tune in to renowned sexpert and sexologist Dr Ava Cadell (founder of Loveology University). Past show archives are posted here as well so you have access to past shows and a wide variety of topics. For more information about Dr Ava Cadell and Loveology University - visit www.loveologyuniversity.com and learn how you can take your love life to a higher level and how you can become a certified love coach.

item.title: Do's and Don'ts of Oral Sex (Ep 2) - Nov 03,2010
item.description:
We Talk Sex with Dr Ava Cadell - Celebrity Sexpert Today's topic: Oral Sex. Dr. Ava answers questions about love, relationships, intimacy and sex. Her celebrity guest is Jackie Zeman, actress from famous soap opera General Hospital.

sex advice | sex questions | jackie zeman | ava cadell | oral sex
